message.entry: {0} must be scalar except when a 2-element translation vector is applied to a stack of 2-D images.
When {1} is a three-element vector, the input image, {0}, must be 3-D.
{0} must be a 2-element or 3-element translation vector.
You specified a 3-D spatial referencing object. Only 2-D spatial referencing objects can be specified.
